ldmx::FindableTrackResult::ClassDef ( FindableTrackResult  ,
3   
) [private]

Refence to the sim particle. Flag indicating whether a particle is findable using the strategy that requires 4 stereo layers. Flag indicating whether a particle is findable using the strategy 3 stereo + 1 axial. Flag indicating whether a particle is findable using the strategy 2 stereo + 2 axial. Flag indicating whether a particle is findable using the strategy 2 axial. This will be mainly used to reject back scattered particles. Flag indicating whether a particle is findable using the 2 stereo strategy. Flag indicating whether a particle is findable using the 3 stereo hit strategy.
